name: Some Days In Hell
description:
Some Days In Hell is a visual novel inspired by the world of Hazbin Hotel. In this game you play as a damned soul who has fallen into hell. In your adventure, meet and talk to the characters from Hazbin Hotel and try to escape from this strange place !

The characters and the universe belong to VivziePop except Luxia created by Elisa Pissis and designed by Yaruhyn.
